aboutSection.goal: We aim to help integrate Ukrainian children by introducing them to the Czech language in a bright and playful way and by putting smiles on their faces.
aboutSection.future: More languages are coming soon to the web version. We're also hard at work on a picture book and a bilingual match-a-pair card game to practice vocabulary.
aboutSection.support: Please consider supporting and following us on social media, where we'll be launching a crowdfunding campaign.

authorsSection.acknowledgement: I'd like to thank everyone who has helped make this project happen and for working on it for free to support its cause. Tereza Axmannov√°
